tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_activities (
    activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_time TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE smart_home_devices (
    device_id INT,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    room_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    device_status BOOLEAN
);
